content.summary: 3 years of experience in software engineering with expertise in backend development, system design, and data processing. Passionate about building reliable and scalable systems. Proficient in:

content.title: NimbusTech
description: Developed a cloud-native API gateway with Spring Boot and AWS Lambda, supporting over 100K daily API requests with 99.99% uptime.
Implemented a real-time event processing system using Kafka, reducing latency in data pipelines by 40%.
Designed a monitoring and alerting framework using Prometheus and Grafana, improving system observability and reducing incident response time.

content.title: DataNova Systems
description: Designed and optimized ETL pipelines for processing large-scale datasets using Python and Spark, reducing processing time by 30%.
Enhanced database indexing and query optimization strategies, improving data retrieval times for critical analytics by 25%.
Integrated a secure authentication system for APIs using OAuth2, ensuring compliance with industry security standards.

content.title: CloudSync Solutions
description: Assisted in building microservices for a cloud storage platform using Node.js, enabling seamless data synchronization across devices.
Wrote unit and integration tests to ensure high code quality and reduce regression issues by 15%.
Collaborated with the DevOps team to containerize services using Docker, improving deployment speed and scalability.

content.title: Automated Expense Tracker
description: Developed a full-stack application to track and analyze expenses, featuring a React frontend and a Flask backend.
Implemented a machine learning model to categorize expenses automatically, improving user insights.
Deployed the application on AWS, integrating S3 for file storage and DynamoDB for transaction data.

content.title: Real-Time Stock Price Alert System
description: Built a system to provide real-time stock price alerts with Python and WebSockets.
Created a mobile-friendly web dashboard using React, allowing users to configure alerts and view historical trends.
Integrated with third-party APIs for live stock data, ensuring reliability and accuracy of updates.

content.title: University of California, Berkeley
description: Specialization: Data Science and Machine Learning, Honors: Summa Cum Laude
Courses: Machine Learning, Distributed Systems, Advanced Algorithms, Data Visualization
